source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CONCAT('01|','20220706_151721') AS LINE
UNION ALL 
SELECT T.LINE FROM (SELECT CONCAT('02|',ROW_ID,'|',REF_ROW_ID ,'|',BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,'|',
LIMIT_MNY ,'|',THRESHOLD_ID ,'|',REQUEST_ID ,'|',ACTION_TYPE ,'|',ACTION_DTM ,'|',REASON_CODE ,'|',REASON_SUBCODE ,'|',
ASSIGN_NO ,'|',TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,'|',CREATED ,'|',CREATED_BY ,'|',LAST_UPD ,'|',LAST_UPD_BY ,'|',SEQ_NO ,'|',
CREDIT_GRADE ,'|',ARPU ,'|',MIN_REVIEW ,'|',SUM_MAIN ,'|',NEXT_BILL_DATE ,'|','Insert') 
 AS LINE FROM CREDIT_UAT.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, CREATED) = CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
ORDER BY LAST_UPD OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT  50000 ROW ONLY  
UNION ALL
SELECT CONCAT('02|',ASSIGN_ROW_ID,'|',ASSIGN_REF_ROW_ID ,'|',BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,'|',
LIMIT_MNY ,'|',THRESHOLD_ID ,'|',REQUEST_ID ,'|',ACTION_TYPE ,'|',ACTION_DTM ,'|',REASON_CODE ,'|',REASON_SUBCODE ,'|',
ASSIGN_NO ,'|',TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,'|',CREATED ,'|',CREATED_BY ,'|',LAST_UPD ,'|',LAST_UPD_BY ,'|',SEQ_NO ,'|',
CREDIT_GRADE ,'|',ARPU ,'|',MIN_REVIEW ,'|',SUM_MAIN ,'|',NEXT_BILL_DATE ,'|','Delete') AS LINE
FROM CREDIT_UAT.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN_AT 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, BATCH_CREATED) = CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
ORDER BY LAST_UPD OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT  50000 ROW ONLY  ) T
UNION ALL 
SELECT CONCAT('09|',COUNT(T2.LINE)) FROM (SELECT CONCAT('02|',ROW_ID,'|',REF_ROW_ID ,'|',BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,'|',
LIMIT_MNY ,'|',THRESHOLD_ID ,'|',REQUEST_ID ,'|',ACTION_TYPE ,'|',ACTION_DTM ,'|',REASON_CODE ,'|',REASON_SUBCODE ,'|',
ASSIGN_NO ,'|',TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,'|',CREATED ,'|',CREATED_BY ,'|',LAST_UPD ,'|',LAST_UPD_BY ,'|',SEQ_NO ,'|',
CREDIT_GRADE ,'|',ARPU ,'|',MIN_REVIEW ,'|',SUM_MAIN ,'|',NEXT_BILL_DATE ,'|','Insert') 
 AS LINE FROM CREDIT_UAT.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, CREATED) = CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
ORDER BY LAST_UPD OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT  50000 ROW ONLY  
UNION ALL
SELECT CONCAT('02|',ASSIGN_ROW_ID,'|',ASSIGN_REF_ROW_ID ,'|',BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,'|',
LIMIT_MNY ,'|',THRESHOLD_ID ,'|',REQUEST_ID ,'|',ACTION_TYPE ,'|',ACTION_DTM ,'|',REASON_CODE ,'|',REASON_SUBCODE ,'|',
ASSIGN_NO ,'|',TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,'|',CREATED ,'|',CREATED_BY ,'|',LAST_UPD ,'|',LAST_UPD_BY ,'|',SEQ_NO ,'|',
CREDIT_GRADE ,'|',ARPU ,'|',MIN_REVIEW ,'|',SUM_MAIN ,'|',NEXT_BILL_DATE ,'|','Delete') AS LINE
FROM CREDIT_UAT.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN_AT 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, BATCH_CREATED) = CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
ORDER BY LAST_UPD OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT  50000 ROW ONLY  ) T2;
